Title: Seasons of Our Love
Actors: Enrico Maria Salerno, Anouk Aimée, Jacqueline Sassard, Gastone Moschin
Plot: Vittorio Borghi, a middle-aged journalist torn between young mistress and wife he no longer loves, returns to his hometown Mantua. There he remembers childhood in the era of fascism, war and ghost of another woman he never forgot.
